keyPolicies.policyDescription: Seek to reduce the trade gap between imports and exports, reduce business rates, and establish a bespoke trade agreement with the EU.
Issue UK residents allowance to replace personal tax allowance, implement a Treasury Commission to design a turnover tax to replace Corporation Tax, and reduce debts owed by the UK.
Resource fully military assets and personnel, correct shortcoming of Veterans Affairs and provide a Veterans Department to bring together all veteran-related services.
Allow failing schools to become independent free schools, encourage skills training and ensure core GCSEs which can be continued at A Level.
Increase spending on roads, rail and ports, and commit to no purchase of foreign buses for UK use.
Change the New Homes Bonus and return the Community Infrastructure Levy to the Local community affected by the developments.
Oppose the creation of any MPs representing the UK in both the UK and EU and implement a recall procedure allowing for recall of any MP.
Repeal the Climate Change Act 2008 to reduce costs for both households and businesses, and end subsidies for new wind turbines.
Leave the Common Agricultural Policy, establish a Single Farm Payment, and reaffirm British territorial waters.
Cross-charge foreign aid at healthcare providers treating foreign nationals at the point of delivery.
Oppose the bedroom tax and ensure the first two children of any household are provided for when calculating benefit.

issues.brexitEurope: Establish a bespoke trade agreement with the EU.
issues.economy: Change tax structures, reduce business rates, reduce national debt, and oppose foreign purchase of businesses.
issues.education: Grant failing schools the option to become free schools, and prioritize education in key subjects.
issues.environment: Repeal the Climate Change Act and end new wind turbine subsidies.
issues.governance: Oppose dual representation in UK and EU parliaments.
issues.health: Cross-charge foreign aid at healthcare providers treating foreign nationals.
issues.immigration: Introduce an Australian-style points-based immigration system, with visas for time-limited periods.
issues.socialWelfare: Ensure the first two children are provided for when computing benefits.

housing.content: Change the New Homes Bonus and return the Community Infrastructure Levy to the local community affected by developments.
